content: this pattern features my little butterfly applique perfect for any butterfly lover and can be used to spice up any garments made into garland or simple decoration the pattern is one size but you can make them slightly bigger or smaller by changing hook size no gauge is required for this pattern you will need basic crochet equipment including 4mm hook dk yarn in your chosen colours it works with many other yarns too including chunky for a bigger butterfly and yarn needle and scissors to fasten_off very little yarn is needed for this project
